graph_title: Udio mladih (u dobi od 15-24) koji nisu zaposleni, ne obrazuju se i ne osposobljavaju se
indicator_definition: This proportion of youth (aged 15-24 years) not in education, employment or training, also known as "the NEET rate", conveys the number of young persons not in education, employment or training as a percentage of the total youth population.
indicator_name: Udio mladih (u dobi od 15-24) koji nisu zaposleni, ne obrazuju se i ne osposobljavaju se
target_name: Do 2020. značajno smanjiti udio mladih koji nisu zaposleni, niti su u procesu obrazovanja ili osposobljavanja
